message.content:
I need to analyze the transactions to calculate the taxes payable in the balance sheet, both at the beginning and end of the period.

First, let me understand what would contribute to taxes payable:
- Primary source would be sales tax collected from customers
- These appear in the transactions as "tax_amount" in sale records

Let me identify the initial taxes payable (as of the initial balance sheet date, 2023-12-31):
- I don't see any explicit initial value for taxes payable in the Initial transactions
- This suggests the initial value is zero

Next, I'll calculate the ending taxes payable by summing all the tax_amount values from sales transactions:

The sum of all tax_amount values for sales transactions = 42,327.18

This represents the taxes collected on behalf of the government which the company will need to remit, so this is the ending taxes payable value.
